comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On July 10, 2011, Jeff'y suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!

comment.author: 29056926@N02
comment._content: According to the comments left on a post about a postcard of the hotel, it was actually about 5 blocks east of the pushpin. (They sound believable by making snide remarks about mislocated photos on other sites) It's not clear to me which side this was taken from, but we're certainly less than 5 blocks away.
